title: Feature Request: Deploy Contracts at Certain Gas Price
body:
- [ ] I've [opened a support ticket](https://trufflesuite.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

Iâ€™m attempting to use the `maxFeePerGas` and `maxPriorityFeePerGas` in `truffle-config.js` for a contract deployment Iâ€™m going where the transaction doesnâ€™t need to be mined right away, it just needs to be mined at a certain gas price. 

## Steps to Reproduce

In `truffle-config.js`:

```javascript
networks: {
    development: {
    [...]
     maxFeePerGas: 20000000000,         
     maxPriorityFeePerGas: 20000000000,
    },
```

## Expected Behavior

For this feature request, waiting for the block gas price to go down to submit the transaction, perhaps with an upper bound time-out.

## Actual Results


![Screen Shot 2022-04-06 at 2 50 47 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8144425/162236113-0e2ae9bf-d024-42c7-ab4a-09873af5999c.png)


## Environment

* Operating System: MacOS
* Ethereum client: Forked Mainnet via Infura (`ganache --fork`)
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): Truffle v5.5.1
* node version (`node --version`): `v16.5.0`
* npm version (`npm --version`): `6.14.16`
